targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  total AS "btc_usd"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_usd AS "btc_usd"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_usd AS "btc_usd"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pnl AS "btc_usd"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_24h AS "btc_usd"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT value as metric FROM fng ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT confidence as metric FROM cbbi ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,15m),
  avg(current) AS "Total"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,15m)

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_1d
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_7d
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,4h),
  avg(bitmex_total_24h) AS "Bitmex",
  avg(binance_total_24h) AS "Binance",
  avg(current_24h) AS "Total"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,4h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1d),
  avg(bitmex_total_24h) AS "Bitmex",
  avg(binance_total_24h) AS "Binance",
  avg(current_24h) AS "Total"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1d)

panels.title: PNL - Total vs. Bitmex vs. Binance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(total) AS "Total",
  avg(btc_usd) AS "BTC"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  currency AS metric,
  balance
FROM binance_balances
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total AS "Binance",
  bitmex_total AS "Bitmex",
  atari_total AS "Atari"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(binance_total) AS "Binance",
  avg(bitmex_total) AS "Bitmex"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(binance_total/bitmex_total) AS "Bitmex / Binance"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)
SELECT symbol AS metric, market_percentage FROM binance_orders ORDER BY market_percentage
SELECT symbol as Symbol, side as Side, amount as Amount, price as Price, market as Market, market_percentage as MP FROM binance_orders ORDER BY market_percentage;
SELECT currency as Currency, balance as Balance, amount as Amount, price as Price, used_percentage as Used FROM binance_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT id as "Rank", rank_delta as Delta, symbol as Symbol, name as Name, price as Price, marketcap as Marketcap, marketcap_dominance as Dominace, 1d_price_change_pct as 1D, 7d_price_change_pct as 1W, 30d_price_change_pct as 1M, 7d_volume_change_pct as "1W vol", 30d_volume_change_pct as "1M vol" FROM marketcap ORDER BY id;
